net.loadbang.web.mxj
Class WebServer

java.lang.Object
  com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      net.loadbang.util.EnrichedMaxObject
          net.loadbang.web.mxj.WebServer

public class WebServer
extends net.loadbang.util.EnrichedMaxObject

A simple web server in MXJ, pointing at a place-holder directory in Max's search path. It launches an embedded Jetty server, and reports web requests to the outside world.

Author:
Nick Rothwell, nick@cassiel.com / nick@loadbang.net
